title: Retry production rebuild and republish (no functional changes)

requirements.text: Rebuild and publish the current application code to production again with no functional changes, ensuring the deployed version includes the latest committed fixes (including the "All areas" rooms visibility behavior).
acceptanceCriteria: A new production build is triggered using the current repo state with no feature/code changes required for this request.
Production deployment completes successfully (no deployment error).
The deployed production build reflects the latest committed fixes, including the "All areas" rooms visibility behavior.

constraints: Do not introduce functional changes; this request is a republish/redeploy only.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; do not split into multiple services.
Do not edit frontend files under immutablePaths (compose existing UI components instead, if any UI change were neededâ€”which it is not for this request).
nonGoals: Adding new features (e.g., room-area filters, new moderation tools, UI redesign).
Backend schema/state migrations (unless strictly required by the platform to complete the redeploy).
